Original:
評分：8.5/10
花費：2350
品項（含排序）：
1.三號/side car
2.招蜂
3.espresso martini (理論上跟招蜂同一順位但剛好我不愛偏酸的咖啡)
4.新火
5.lychee martini
心得：店內小巧精緻，非常的日式感覺，酒的呈現店內裝潢都帶點禪意，但調酒師只有一人，客滿的時候會需要不停的做酒（從我進店到離開手沒停過），雖然有留意到客人需求，但我猜沒那麼忙時，體驗會更好。
EN:
Rating: 8.5/10
Cost: 2350
Product (including sorting):
1. No. 3/SIDE CAR
2. Recruit bee
3. Espresso Martini (theoretically the same coffee with the same setting as a bee -bee but I do not like sour)
4. New fire
5.LYCHEEE MARTINI
Experience: The shop is small and exquisite, very Japanese -style, and the interior decoration of the wine is a little Zen, but there is only one person in the bartender. When you are full, you will need to make wine. I have noticed the needs of the guests, but I guess it will be better when I guess so busy.

Original:
不知道是第幾訪了，酒單都會有定期更新的品項，這次多了草莓系列，2杯草莓系列我都滿愛的，第1杯酸甜清爽，第2杯有點像草莓奶昔尾韻帶點荔枝味，另外還點了芭樂口味的調酒也還ok，不過最愛的還是chocolate martini!

總共點了4杯調酒1杯特調，這次酒單有增加新品項，最愛變成chocolate martini，水果系列還是很不錯，可以先比較清爽的開始最後再喝martini結尾，另外還被招待了3杯shot，有小微醺。

一訪：
總共點了8杯調酒，每杯約350-400元不等，在台北不算貴，喜歡新出的水果系列調酒，最愛芒果口味，另外被招待的3杯shot也都很不錯。

One visit:
A total of 8 cups of alcohol, ranging from about 350-400 yuan per cup. It is not expensive in Taipei. I like the new fruit series of bartending. I love the taste of mango the most.

Original:
簡單、乾淨，把風味給得剛剛好。

通化街六張犁附近新開的酒吧，剛好是朋友認識，試營運的期間來試試；意料之外展現出水準以上的呈現，不過目前人手較少情況下出酒會稍微慢一些。

Bartender 過去待過隱城小城外，做出的酒很符合店名 Hinoki 的感覺：沒有過多的酸甜或鋪張，而是像參天檜木般低調單純又無法忽視其層次的堆疊。

個人最推薦的 signature 會是 Hinoki III，清爽的小黃瓜配上木質尾韻，氣泡感更能把風味帶出。店裡也直接擺了一整塊檜木，在準備入酒需要的 garnish 時，會直接刨小片下來，很有特色。

而 classic twist 則必須狂推 Modern Lychee Martini，完完全全感受在喝一整顆的玉荷包，但又不會過於甜膩反而是恰好包覆了 martini 本身較重的酒感；而 White Negroni 與 Smoky Rosita 也是我挺喜歡的風味。

唯一小小美中不足是不大的空間下，回音稍微有些大；當 bartender 在 shake 的時候會感到刺耳，而客人聊天的音量也比較容易放大，不曉得後續是否有機會改善。現階段試營運還會持續調整酒單，建議大家可以多去感受嘗試。
EN:
Simple and clean, just give the flavor just right.

The newly opened bar near Liuzhangli, Tonghua Street, just happened to be a friend. Try it during the trial operation; unexpectedly showing the presentation of the level or above, but at present, there are fewer people. The wine will be slightly slower.

Bartender has been outside the small city of the hidden city in the past, and the wine made in line with the feeling of the store name Hinoki: there is no too much sweet and sour or paved, but it is low -key like a towering cypress.

The most recommended SIGNATURE will be HinoKi III. The refreshing cucumber with wooden tail rhyme, the bubble feeling can bring out the flavor.There is also a whole piece of citrus in the store. When preparing Garnish you need to enter the wine, it will directly plan a small piece, which is very distinctive.

And Classic Twist must push the Modern Lychee Martini madly, and feels that I drink a whole jade purse, but it will not be too sweet, but it just covers the heavy wine of Martini's itself; while White Negroni and Smoky Rosita is also my favorite flavor.

In the only small beauty in the small beauty, the echo is slightly big; when Bartender is harsh when the shake is in the shake, and the volume of the guest chat is easier to enlarge, I don't know if there is a chance to improve the subsequent.At this stage, the trial operation will continue to adjust the wine list. It is recommended that you feel more to try.

Original:
這間小酒吧的特色調酒是著重木調香氣的，喜歡與否應該都很極端。

個人喜好Hinoki系列，各自都有明顯自己的木製想起，混搭起來也很有和諧感。white negroni也有一股明顯的草本香，抹茶琴酒那杯酒比較中規中矩 比較像在喝冰抹茶加琴酒。

應該是剛開始營業不久，菜單稍微少了一些不過一晚是夠喝的了！

Personally like the HinoKi series, each has clearly remembered its own wooden system, and it is also very harmonious to mix and match.White Negroni also has an obvious herbal incense. The cup of wine of matcha wine is more satisfactory like drinking ice matcha and piano wine.

It should be just beginning to open, the menu is slightly less, but it is enough to drink it one night!

Original: 地點位在基隆路巷子內，鬧中取靜，裝潢穩重無壓迫感。這次點了Side Car、White Negroni和Smoky Rosita，十分考驗技術的Side Car酸甜平衡香氣芬芳，White Negroni則是藥草風味複雜卻又能夠主客和諧，Smoky Rosita是表現最棒的一杯，用煙燻味強烈的Mezcal做為基酒，酒譜裡不諳調酒的客人會打槍的Campari，巧妙使用Espresso來穿針引線，加成前味的煙燻、柔化尾韻的苦味，若有似無地帶出更多層次，非常高明的經典調酒調整版。雖然甫開幕，不過每晚高朋滿座的盛況，店家的調酒技術不言而喻了。
EN: The location is located in the alley on Keelung Road.This time, I ordered Side Car, White Negroni and Smoky Rosita. The SIDE Car is very sour and sour fragrance. White Negroni is the complex of herbs but can be harmonious. Smoky Rosita is the best performance. The strong MEZCAL is used as a base wine. Campari who does not bartender in the winemaker will use ESPRESSO to wear a needle to draw the wire. More levels, very clever classic bartending adjustment versions.Although the opening of the opening, every night, Gao Peng is full of the grand occasion, the store's bartending technology is self -evident.

Original: 酒吧就像城市中一顆隱藏的寶石。交通便利，位置優越（靠近夜市，有很多美味的食物選擇），但酒吧的氛圍非常平靜、安靜和優雅。所有飲品均經過精心製作，口感細膩，香氣層次豐富。強烈推薦。
EN: The bar is like a hidden gem in the city.Convenient transportation and excellent location (near the night market, there are many delicious food choices), but the atmosphere of the bar is very calm, quiet and elegant.All drinks have been carefully made, with delicate taste and rich aroma.Strongly recommended.

Original: 食材的味道很濃，但沒有太多深度和層次。適合與朋友快速聚會。當聲音和聲音從牆壁反彈並產生迴聲時，可能會變得嘈雜。
EN: The taste of ingredients is very strong, but there is not much depth and layer.Suitable for quickly meeting with friends.When the sound and sound rebound from the wall and generate echo, it may become noisy.

Original: 請在週末和週五預訂。可愛的爵士樂場所，提供令人驚嘆的雞尾酒，與迷人的氛圍相搭配。推薦10/10
EN: Please book on weekends and Friday.The cute jazz is provided with amazing cocktails, which is matched with a charming atmosphere.Recommended 10/10

Original: 很棒的小雞尾酒吧。有趣的調酒師和雞尾酒都做得很好。
EN: A great cocktail bar.Interesting bartenders and cocktails do well.

Original: 台北最好的酒吧之一
EN: One of the best bars in Taipei

Original: 精心調製，享受令人難以置信的雞尾酒之夜。
EN: Carefully modify, enjoy incredible cocktail night.

Original: 您所需要的一切，僅此而已。很棒的一站
EN: Everything you need is just that.A great stop

Original: 一個我可以喝一杯來治癒和安慰我的靈魂的地方。
EN: A place where I can drink a cup to cure and comfort my soul.

Original:
毫無疑問，鎮上一流的酒吧。
如果您正在尋找像樣的飲料，這裡不會讓您失望
EN:
There is no doubt that the first -class bar in the town.
If you are looking for decent drinks, it will not disappoint you here

Original: 不錯
EN: good

Original: 態度惡劣
EN: Bad attitude

Original: 台北最好的酒吧
EN: The best bar in Taipei

Original: 好喝
EN: Delicious

Original: 好喝一直喝
EN: Drink all the time
